home_header: We’ve got your morning covered with
home_sub: It is best to start your day with a cup of coffee. Discover the best flavours coffee you will ever have. We provide the best for our customers.
discover_sub: Bean Scene is a coffee shop that provides you with quality coffee that helps boost your productivity and helps build your mood. Having a cup of coffee is good, but having a cup of real coffee is greater. There is no doubt that you will enjoy this coffee more than others you have ever tasted.
versusCoffeeSub: We don’t just make your coffee, we make your day!
